document_data.name: Shaliana Ghend
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaliana Ghend''' was a merchant in [[Scardale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.History: Shaliana was the only merchant to survive without damage the rule of [[Lashan Aumersair]]. She only relocated to outside the town of Scardale after the [[Second inter-dale war]]. In 1368 DR, she decided to send her daughter [[Talana Ghend]] to reopen inside the city.
